snippet: While N.H.L. teams take a break, some of their affiliates will play in the parent arenas, offering players a taste of the big time and fans a chance to see young talent.
abstract: NHL teams are taking a break during Winter Olympics, allowing some of their minor league affiliates to play in NHL arenas, which gives players a taste of the big time and fans a chance to see young talent.
lead_paragraph: While N.H.L. teams take a break, some of their affiliates will play in the parent arenas, offering players a taste of the big time and fans a chance to see young talent.

headline.main: During Olympics, Minor League Teams Gladly Borrow Vacated N.H.L. Ice
headline.print_headline: During Olympics, Minor League Teams Gladly Borrow Vacated N.H.L. Ice
